game.name: Furry Killer
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: "Furry Killer" is a fast-paced arena shooter where you fight against waves of evil furry creatures. Defeat them, collect coins, and upgrade your weapons to survive in an endless mode.
